oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Capitol Boulevard, Looking North, Nashville, Tenn., between 1916 and 1930
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A postcard of Capitol Boulevard looking north towards the Tennessee State Capitol sometime between 1916 and 1930. YMCA signage is visible on the left side of the street, while Knickerbocker Theater signage is identifiable on the right side. Cars are parked on both sides of the road. Forms part of the Norton Postcard Collection. 1 postcard : col. ; 3.5 x 5.5 in.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Tennessee State Capitol (Nashville, Tenn.); Knickerbocker Theater (Nashville, Tenn.); YMCA of Middle Tennessee
